A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was a good movie for the first and second act\, the third act took the story in a direction that I did not enoy. I felt I did not get even a few of the things I hoped for. the mysteries of episode 7 were destroyed or ignored and this movie gave me nothing that I look forward to for 9. I disliked Lukes character (althought MH played it very well)\, I think it was a betrayel of who he is/was. Not a single lightsaber battle. WTH?
